title: Create standard project directories — create_dirs
text: Creates set standard directories repository: scripts, data (subdirectories raw, processed, output) results (subdirectories img tab)

title: Create standard project directories — create_dirs
text: other_dirs needed, character vector containing names extra directories.

title: Create standard project directories — create_dirs
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ create_dirs() # This creates default directories  create_dirs(other_dirs = "docs") # Creates all default directories and a "docs" directory } # }

what: Color palette for the Shared Socio-economic Pathways (SSPs) — palette_IPCC_ssp
title: Color palette for the Shared Socio-economic Pathways (SSPs) — palette_IPCC_ssp
text: Representative Concentration Pathways (RCPs) Socio-economic Pathways (SSPs), indicated IPCC AR6 WGI style guide

title: Color palette for the Shared Socio-economic Pathways (SSPs) — palette_IPCC_ssp
Color palette for the Shared Socio-economic Pathways (SSPs) — palette_IPCC_ssp
Color palette for the Shared Socio-economic Pathways (SSPs) — palette_IPCC_ssp
text: ssp character vector specifying SSPs required. Options `"SSP5-8.5"`, `"SSP3-7.0"`, `"SSP2-4.5"`, `"SSP1-2.6"` `"SSP1-1.9"`

title: Color palette for the Shared Socio-economic Pathways (SSPs) — palette_IPCC_ssp
text: NAMED vector containing pairs SSP names colors.

title: UM Color palette — palette_UM
text: discrete color palette 10 colors based Unviersity Miami's color identity guidelines.

title: UM Color palette — palette_UM
text: See University Miami's Visual Identity Cues Web: https://webcomm.miami.edu/resources/identity/color/index.html

title: UM Color palette — palette_UM
text: n integer. Number colors return, maximum 10. require_WCAG boolean specifying whether colors returned comply Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2 Level AA Conformance (See https://www.w3.org/WAI/WCAG2AA-Conformance). Defaults FALSE.
